Package Catalano.Math.Distances

The Catalano.Math.Distances namespace contains set of distances (Euclidean, Manhattan, Chessboard, ...) which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDistance<T>
    Common interface for distance measure.
    IDivergence<T>
    Common interface for divergence measure.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArithmeticGeometricDivergence
    Arithmetic Geometric divergence.
    BhattacharyyaDistance
    Bhattacharyya distance measures the similarity of two discrete or continuous probability distributions.

    Bray-Curtis distance.
    CanberraDistance
    Canberra distance.
    ChebyshevDistance
    Chebyshev distance.
    ChiSquareDistance
    Chi-Square histogram distance.
    CorrelationDistance
    Correlation distance.
    CosineDistance
    Cosine Distance.
    Distance
    Defines a set of extension methods defining distance measures.

    Euclidean distance.

    J-Divergence.

    Jensen difference divergence.

    Jensen Shannon divergence.

Package Catalano.Math.Distances Description

The Catalano.Math.Distances namespace contains set of distances (Euclidean, Manhattan, Chessboard, ...) which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.
